com.ricoh.camera.sdk.wireless.api.setting.camera

Class CameraDeviceSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ricoh.camera.sdk.wireless.api.setting.camera.CameraDeviceSetting
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CameraTime, DeviceInterfaceSetting, DualCardSlotsMode

    public abstract class CameraDeviceSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is base class for camera device settings.
    Sub classes of this class are used to handle camera device settings.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CameraDeviceSetting.Value
      This class is base for value of camera settings.
